subTitle: Common questions about our data consultancy services.

faqs.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
faqs.answer: We specialize exclusively in the Microsoft Data Platform. This includes Power BI, Azure SQL Database, Azure Synapse Analytics, Azure Data Factory, and the new Microsoft Fabric ecosystem.

faqs.question: Do you offer training for our internal team?
faqs.answer: Yes! We believe in empowering our clients. We offer tailored training sessions for Power BI developers, data engineers, and business users to ensure you get the most out of your data investment.

faqs.question: Can you help us migrate from on-premise to the cloud?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Cloud migration is one of our core competencies. We can help you assess your current on-premise SQL Server environment and design a migration strategy to Azure that minimizes downtime and maximizes performance.

faqs.question: What is Microsoft Fabric and should we be using it?
faqs.answer: Microsoft Fabric is an all-in-one analytics solution for enterprises that covers everything from data movement to data science, Real-Time Analytics, and business intelligence. We can help you evaluate if Fabric is the right fit for your organization and help you implement it.

faqs.question: How do you ensure data security?
faqs.answer: Security is paramount in everything we do. We follow Microsoft's best practices for security and governance, implementing Row-Level Security (RLS), Object-Level Security (OLS), and network security measures to protect your sensitive data.

faqs.question: Do you provide ongoing support after the project is finished?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer Managed Analytics services where we provide ongoing monitoring, support, and enhancements for your data platform, ensuring it continues to meet your evolving business needs.
